text: Trail is a Canadian city in British Columbia, Canada. Trail is in the West Kootenay region of British Columbia. At the 2021 census, 7,920 people lived in Trail. The current mayor of Trail is Colleen Jones. Trail has a BCHL (British Columbia Hockey League) ice hockey team called the Trail Smoke Eaters. ==Other websites== *City of Trail's Official website Category:Cities in British Columbia
title: Trail, British Columbia
